channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: Match of the Day
channel.desc: Gabby Logan presents highlights of the day's seven Premier League games, including Manchester City against Everton, Newcastle's trip to Brighton, and an intriguing clash between Crystal Palace and Bournemouth. Nottingham Forest take on Chelsea in the day's early game with Ange Postecoglou looking for his first win since taking over at Forest. League leaders Arsenal travel to Fulham in the evening kick-off.
